hero.subtext: Premium trading cards, memorabilia, and exclusive drops for the true fan. Certified authentic, delivered with Southern hospitality.

items.title: Certified Authentic
items.desc: Every item is verified by our expert team or third-party graders.

items.title: Lightning Fast Shipping
items.desc: Same-day processing on all orders placed before 2PM EST.

items.title: Mint Condition
items.desc: We specialize in Gem Mint 10s and pristine raw cards.

shop.sectionSubtitle: Fresh from the vault. Secure your piece of history before they're gone.

about.title: Preserving History.
about.text: Carolina Minted Collectibles isn't just a shop; it's a tribute to the legends who paved the way. We source the finest cards and memorabilia with a focus on North Carolina sports history. Whether you are hunting for that elusive rookie card or a piece of the hardwood, we are your trusted partner.

newsletter.title: Don't Miss the Next Drop
newsletter.text: Join the VIP list for early access to new arrivals and exclusive discounts.

brandColumn.title: Carolina Minted
brandColumn.text: The premier destination for high-end sports collectibles in the Tar Heel State.
